website_summaries.verdict: Includes two full years of preschool curriculum content. If you don't have a CD drive, the purchase includes a digital download.
pros: CD-ROM with 2 full years of preschool curriculum
Covers letter and number recognition, basic phonics and math concepts, shapes, colors, and more
cons: Very thorough, but requires a lot of printing and preparation

customer_reviews.title: A life saver for the stay-at-home parents!
customer_reviews.text: My 4- year old son hated learning until I started using this curriculum! Now, he can't wait for each day's lesson and activities! I am not creative by nature and appreciate structure, so this has been great having a tool that gives me book recommendations, a craft supply list, a daily schedule, printable work sheets and even songs to sing, poems to read and much much more.
customer_reviews.author: BeHappy

customer_reviews.title: Once you get the first two weeks set up and have supplies ready you will love this program
customer_reviews.text: We just finished a year of this curriculum and there is plenty to be used for next year. The layout reminds me of Heart of Dakota manuals. It requires parental set up and printing of pages. My suggestion is to place pages in plastic protectors and don't worry about not covering all the options. The curriculum is thorough and covers everything a teacher would teach in an academic setting. Once you get the first two weeks set up and have supplies ready you will love this program.
customer_reviews.author: Holly G.

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, love it!
customer_reviews.text: This Preschool curriculum kit is the best purchase you can make if you're homeschooling your little one.... It for sure made my life so much easier because it has everything you need to homeschool your kid just on 1 cd. Has a full 10month program both standard Alphabethal sequence and the Montessori Aproach. It's pretty easy to follow because it has a day by day lesson plans and lots of fun activities and printables that go with it. I can't express enough how much I love this cd! Purchasing this Preschool Curriculum kit was definitely worth it. I personally think that every mom that is homeschooling their little one should buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Soraya K

customer_reviews.title: Spend time with them while they're young.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to do with my child at home that was fun and educational and inspired us to interact. These lesson plans are great...not only does my son enjoy doing them, we're spending more time together than ever before while getting him prepared for tougher lessons ahead at school. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Andreae

customer_reviews.title: I love this curriculum
customer_reviews.text: I love this curriculum!!! My little girl finds it fun and she has learned so much from the lessons. We only school twice a week because of time commitment problems, but she still has learned so much with the lessons. I love the lesson plans and that I can print them out. I printed out the lessons and placed them in a folder so I can follow along easily. I also printed out the worksheets so my daughter can do them. She loves to show me her completed work. Thanks for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: TVO

customer_reviews.title: A must for an inexperienced homeschooler!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to teach your preschooler! I just started homeschooling my preschooler and i was so lost, buying so much material, not knowing where or how to start. I saw a review on YouTube and immediately ordered this curriculum. I am so happy I purchased this. Right away i printed out the first week of daily lessons and the worksheets required and started on the lessons the flvery first day. This is exactly what I needed. Thank you for making it so easy!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Save Your money!!
customer_reviews.text: The material is poorly organized. You can easily find this material on the internet for free. In fact, there is better material on Youtube. Save your money!!
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Great resource for toddlers, time saver for parents!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on time and exactly as described. It was very easy to retrieve the documents off the disk. SO happy I got this. There is NO need to print everything at once or buy everything in one setting. Read through it and determine what sequence you want to use. I love having 2 curriculum options. This allows me to add to/take away and adjust as I see fit. I am coupling this with ABC Mouse (which the kiddos love) and couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Here is a sheet on 4 and one on 5 and 6 and 7 and and and
customer_reviews.text: Little more than a collection of worksheets to print. Worksheets are not a good way to teach preschoolers. I should have done my research. Makes this kind of useless except for coloring sheets. Get some manipulatives or use things you already have. Use natural teaching moments as they arise. Go for walks and talk to your kid(s). Save the drill and kill for their teachers when the kids are older.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G

customer_reviews.title: Really good workbook and lesson plans for early learners and young special needs students
customer_reviews.text: Our son is non-verbal and special needs and starting 1st Grade. He is just starting to understand some of the colors and shapes. Most of the Preschool and Kindergarten workbooks quickly get too advanced. This is the first curriculum I've seen that elaborates on all the basics (Numbers, colors, shapes) that he could really spend enough time to understand and get a good grasp of the concepts.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: Comprehensive lesson plans
customer_reviews.text: I love how comprehensive this content is. The lesson plans are broken down by day, which takes the pain away from trying to put the lesson plans together on my own. One suggestion though - Would love to have a downloadable link for all the content instead of a CD. Some computers no longer have CD drives. I had to ask my husband to upload everything into a drive for me access the content. Otherwise, very happy with the purchase. Would like to know if there is anything similar available for 1-3 year olds?
customer_reviews.author: Lisichka

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase! I am a thrifty person; I spent loads of time every week trying to create my own preschool curriculum for my three-year-old, scouring Pinterest and home schooling blogs. It was too much work! So I bought these lesson plans and they are well worth it! Some of the activities are meant for a group setting, but it's all easily adaptable for a single child. My daughter loves having school time every day. And I've noticed that I was missing subject matter I should have been teaching her. These lesson plans help me make sure she's learning everything she should be. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I think we are going to have a great learning experience with this curriculum
customer_reviews.text: I am a Family childcare provider and I have been looking for a curriculum to use with the toddlers that I service. I have not used it yet, but I have looked over the lessons. I think we are going to have a great learning experience with this curriculum. I 1st heard about this through Pinterest and the reviews were great. This was a great value as I looked at many sites to make this purchase, this was the best offer I found.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying this curriculum. My kids have learned so much already and they are enjoying "school time." Chris from the company has emailed me personally to make sure I am satisfied with the product. I have yet to come across any problems! It is encouraging to find a company dedicated to their customer satisfaction. This product is saving me time and money so that is a win in my book! Thank you Preschool palace!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Love Preschool Curriculum Kit!
customer_reviews.text: I am a family home daycare and I have been looking for great lesson plans and curriculum for over a year and nothing compares to the Preschool Curriculum Kit!! I love this curriculum! Everything is already planned out; this includes lesson plans, activities such as circle time, food crafts arts, art crafts, sensory activities and more! I highly recommend the preschool curriculum kit for parents and home daycare use.
customer_reviews.author: workingwomen1

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. It’s a great price for what you get. I have the CD but also downloaded everything to my computer and saved it in my email so I will have it forever. I am using it with my in home daycare/preschool and for my own children. I don’t use everything but there are tons of great ideas to go off of and worksheets to print for the children. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a blank disc
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to print the seasonal packet for fall. I finally got access to an external CD-ROM drive and the disc is blank. I waited too long to try it and now I'm just out the money I spent. I highly recommend that you do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to educate my son at home! I only plan to send him to 1 year of preschool so this was a great way to make sure he was learning what he needed to learn while at home. We printed the handouts and my son works on them out of his binder. I don't follow the plan necessarily... we go at his pace. Some days he wants to do several handouts and other days he's not as interested do we may just do 1. Overall I am happy with the content of this and like that he can learn from home while still having fun doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Great way to continue educating at home.
customer_reviews.text: This is making the most of our time at home due to corona virus. Because his school is doing online classes I don’t need the structure of the curriculum. We’ve been printing out a few work sheets for each day and my active 3yr old actually likes to do them. Totally recommend for help in homeschooling.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Meyer

customer_reviews.title: This came in a DVD box.. I would ...
customer_reviews.text: This came in a DVD box.. I would suggest probably getting this digitized and offering a digital download or even mailing a USB thumb drive instead of a disc... I don't have a disc drive so I am having to go to the library to download the files to a thumb drive myself.
customer_reviews.author: Catey C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product.
customer_reviews.text: The DVD case arrived wrapped in plastic as all DVD cases do. When I opened the plastic and the case the back of the DVD was covered in scratches. It’s pretty clear that someone returned the item to Amazon and then Amazon wrapped it back in plastic and re-sold. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Myrick

customer_reviews.title: It is definitely a great tool to have
customer_reviews.text: Took my daughter out of daycare to save money and I decided to purchase this disc over others. It is definitely a great tool to have. I suggest if you're a teacher to use the printables and laminate them for reuse instead of printing tons of pages.
customer_reviews.author: Maquiesha88

customer_reviews.title: Easy of Preschool lesson creation
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the variety and clarity of the two different types of lesson plans with the printable worksheets. Very helpful with creating lessons for my homeschooled preschoolers.
customer_reviews.author: Halima

customer_reviews.title: ... journey with my two kids and this was absolutely excellent! It maps out every single lesson and then ...
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a step by step curriculum to begin my homeschool journey with my two kids and this was absolutely excellent! It maps out every single lesson and then by week and lessons and incorporates soooo much! Only reason I didn't give it five stars that for me it was a little too busy, that for me personally I'm using a slightly watered down version, to keep our days a bit more manageable especially for "new" students and teacher ;)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the best item I could have ever bought! There’s sooooooooo much for you to print. It covers EVERY DAY plus holidays. It’s detailed. It’s just amazing! Seriously this item is a lifesaver and I can not wait to start homeschool next week!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this! With covid happening, I couldn't send my daughter to preschool this year. She just turned 3, and so far this curriculum is wonderful! The daily breakdown makes it so easy for a mom like me that has never done homeschooling. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: The activities were not very interesting to my toddler. ...
customer_reviews.text: The activities were not very interesting to my toddler. Not sure if it's because we have done these and similar ones for the last couple of years, but she wasn't into it. So we didn't use this much. However, I am waiting to use it on my son once he gets old enough to sit and understand. Will come back and update with his response to it.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Matters To Me

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 - very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Preschool Palace curriculum. It is very thought out and I love how structured it is. I am a busy mother, and I am so relieved this has day to day activities planned out and I can follow along, skip certain things (not that we do) or even add certain things. My daughter absolutely loves all of the activities as well. The owner sends personal messages out as well, you can tell they really care about their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Munroe

customer_reviews.title: ... they will need for kindergarten but also to have fun learning! I especially appreciate the personal note from ...
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed for our kids to practice skills they will need for kindergarten but also to have fun learning! I especially appreciate the personal note from the company after my purchase to make sure it met my needs. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: leegirl67

customer_reviews.title: This curriculum is great however it is definitely geared more toward classes
customer_reviews.text: This curriculum is great however it is definitely geared more toward classes, not individual children. We have to skip a lot of the activities because I am only teaching my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: avermilliano

customer_reviews.title: Preschool Palace is simply wonderful it has everything you need from the activities through ...
customer_reviews.text: Preschool Palace is simply wonderful it has everything you need from the activities through Informal Assessments. A much needed resource for Early Childhood Educators. It gives you an extra piece into teaching children and guiding them appropriately. I bought both the A and B CD because I did not want to miss on anything they had to offer. I am a Montessori Educator and they even had the Montessori format to learning in the the other CD which was helpful whether you teach Montessori or not both are just as equally great to have! Keep Up The Great Resources!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well organized, flexible preschool program
customer_reviews.text: I like the lesson plans and worksheets included in the curriculum. I love the activities and arts and crafts ideas. I am using this curriculum to home school my preschoolers. Everything is outlined for the teacher and flexible for the group size or age. It has taken the stress of trying to put together a home preschool program together. It looks like fun. There is prep time needed to be supplied for the activities and art projects. Many of the materials are reused and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: dedic

customer_reviews.title: Education in spite of COVID 19
customer_reviews.text: With the uncertainty of the future school year, I wanted to be ahead of the game just in case we needed to do preschool at home. My aunt, who is a retired school teacher, was very impressed with the program and how everything is covered. Needless to say, my 2 and 4 year old will be getting a jump start in their education, and I'm super excited about it!! This program is worth every penny and very easy to use. All you will need, are some items for hands on projects and a printer to print off the worksheets!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent! As a stay at home mom of two small kids, 18 mo and 3 yrs old, I finally feel like I have all the tools necessary to begin teaching them the basics without feeling overwhelmed. The CD has everything from lesson plans (along with a schedule) to print outs to a list of materials needed for activities. It even has snack ideas that coordinate with what you are teaching! Very impressed with the amount of info here and love how easy it is to use! I laminated a lot of the pages so I could reuse with my 18 mo. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Klohr

customer_reviews.title: The variety of the work pages
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety of the worksheets and how many you get and a calender
customer_reviews.author: Davianna

customer_reviews.title: Great for quarantine
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the money. Is keeping my 4 year old entertained during quarantine. I printed the worksheets at office max and it was very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: sarzsa

customer_reviews.title: Worth every bit we spent...
customer_reviews.text: So far It seems like something our child would enjoy,at her age I have trouble having her focus but we are working and praying about that.. We purchased your product to help us begin this transition into homeschooling which is not so far away!! Many thanks and God Bless!!
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money
customer_reviews.text: So much more than I excepted. A full curriculum laid out for you in easy to print off files. I feel more prepared as I start my first year of homeschool.
customer_reviews.author: Kati P.

customer_reviews.title: This was an amazing package that helped us execute a thriving curriculum to ...
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing package that helped us execute a thriving curriculum to our students. By incorporating the areas of Montessouri, we feel confident that the students are exposed to the appropriate developmental objectives and are learning in a fun way. Thanks for offering this product!
customer_reviews.author: ROSE

customer_reviews.title: Really easy preschool curriculum
customer_reviews.text: This curriculum was very easy to understand and print off.I wasn’t expecting to have as much as there in this curriculum,which is great because she enjoys doing school work at this age.I don’t have concerns about or anything that I don’t like about it.Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Dye

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and organized! Everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: I put the disk in my computer and everything is organized so nicely! I’m able to print just what I need easily! I love the themes! It goes along well with the themes I’ve designed already! Shortens my planning time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for homeschooling but better if you are running a ...
customer_reviews.text: I would rather have a workbook with tear out pages than this. Not the best for homeschooling but better if you are running a preschool or daycare.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 4 year old÷
customer_reviews.text: Excellent curriculum for a good price. Be ready to print some pages in color though. Some of the lessons areally easier than others, definitely for 4-5 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The disk actually routes you to an online site. Some of the worksheets have very rudimentary images and some are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.BB

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This disk is a disappointment. The Table of Contents is worthless which means you have to go through contents repeatedly, repeatedly to find what you need. There is NO organization what so ever to this so-called "kit".
customer_reviews.author: Dewwhipper

customer_reviews.title: Not good for single child use
customer_reviews.text: Not good for single child use. Required tone of paper to print and ink. Would be better if it was a computer program. I returned, it seemed like too much for what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Cdziurda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product! Easy to understand and use! I have a 3 year old that I will use this with this year and am so impressed with the daily planner and printables in this cd. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: this cd is perfect for me as I am homeschooling my 2 yr old. I love that it has schedules and fun ideas plus tons of information and coloring sheets to print out. Worth it
customer_reviews.author: Casey Young

customer_reviews.title: Great Curriculum
customer_reviews.text: I love this Curriculum. There are so many different activities and worksheets. My kids love the songs and have enjoyed many of the suggested activities
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: Preschool at home!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS!!! I home school my preschool age daughter. I needed something that was actually a full curriculum. This has an itinerary to follow, lesson plans, the printables, everything you need to successfully teach preschool skills to ANY child. I absolutely would recommend this to ANYONE. 10 months of preschool for this price is a steal! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Navy_wife

customer_reviews.title: Won't print!
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it has great curriculum but I can't get it to print! I have tried different computers and even tried saving it. It just sends error messages to my printer. (My printer will print everything else just fine) it's annoying to spend $20 and be able to see the curriculum but not let me print it for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my 3 year old and we ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old and we are excited to get started. I wanted a lesson plan that would show me what kids her age are learning now. She is way ahead of the curve right now but we are still going to go through everything anyway. Thank you for the program!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hamer

customer_reviews.title: Definately worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love this curriculum! I primarily use curriculum B, but integrate some parts of curriculum A as well ( like community helpers) for my 2 1/2 year old. It is laid out for a classroom in the beginning, but is easily adapted for a homeschool setting. I recommend investing in a good printer and printing lessons on a weekly or monthly basis.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Dvd might not work if does bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Dvd didn't work on my computer but thankfully worked on husbands. Lots of bang for the buck even if worksheets are kind of generic. Great way to prepare kids for prek.
customer_reviews.author: Heather D.

customer_reviews.title: Not very interesting to keep kids attention
customer_reviews.text: My son learned more from ap mini and Blippi. He was board and not interested in this
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Arrington

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for busy mom with two kiddos .
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t started the program but just looking through everything I was impressed with how much detail was put into every page as well as the weekly and daily lay out this will make it very easy for mom and kiddos to follow ! I will be changing the book recommendations though to fit more reading into our curriculum with more variety . Very impressed would buy again In a heart beat! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Steever

customer_reviews.title: Being a new stay at home mom I really loved the price and all of the activities I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Being a new stay at home mom I really loved the price and all of the activities I can do with my 3 and a half year old. He loves it and I can print them again and again.
customer_reviews.author: TaylorMade Tank

customer_reviews.title: Would be perfect for a preschool
customer_reviews.text: Has a good curriculum schedule and worksheets! Would be perfect for a preschool or a daycare with preschool age children!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Carter

customer_reviews.title: Completely digital
customer_reviews.text: It was completely digital and did not work for my staff.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lotane

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Curriculm!
customer_reviews.text: Great for small daycares! I have about 4 kids from 3 to 4 that I take care of and I wanted a more learning structure to our routine. I love how planned and detailed this curriculm is. There's so many printables as well. Be aware this is a disc not an actual book. The files are all PDF which are easy to print off. It really is a great addition!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Harris

customer_reviews.title: Overwhelming
customer_reviews.text: I was I total confusion and chaos about this as if it wasn't organized enough, I felt the Ebooks would've been actual Ebooks not printable work books, too much of the same stuff to print I felt like I could get all this online for free, honestly I wasn't gonna spend a fortune to print everything 910 pages are you kidding, was hoping Ebooks were real books on colors and shapes also the lettering doesn't have arrows as it appears on title cover ,.. I rather buy a real curriculum from somewhere with all books than spend a money to print when you might as well spend it on curriculum to be organized ... This wasn't working for me
customer_reviews.author: AJackson reviews

customer_reviews.title: Love this curriculum
customer_reviews.text: Love this curriculum! Basic, but perfect! I did not catch that it would be in CD format, but it only cost $48 to have it printed off. Truly this is an awesome deal!
customer_reviews.author: Michael B Myers

customer_reviews.title: This product gave a great outline for how lessons should progress
customer_reviews.text: This product gave a great outline for how lessons should progress, building on each other through the year. The worksheets and activities were not as "kid-friendly" (colorful, cute, fun, contemporary) as some of the free downloads online.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Buijk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing amount of information
customer_reviews.text: So much information in one place is amazing. Plus it's very easy to find what you want to work on next.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My cd rom can't read it, so i download it from the website. Easy to download.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: 2 diff. Currics
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to implement the curriculum. We will be starting next week. Although I have printed and sorted the majority of curriculum b (montessori) and am in love with it! My daughter is only 2 and the boy I nanny for will be 2 very soon. I love the option for 2 different currics. I will be using both over the next few years. I will give an updated review in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: mckensie morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful resource! Great content and easy to use. Wonderful value! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnne Hall

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Like this, but some of the printables need colored printer. You know the ones that teach colors. Lol. Silly me! But yes this is basic learning that is convenient to just find what u want and print. .
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Hamill

customer_reviews.title: it's was especially useful being able to contrast two different approaches to preschool ...
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful and organized preschool tool. it's was especially useful being able to contrast two different approaches to preschool education. Tomorrow I'll try out some of the work sheets and games with a 3 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Preschool for in home daycare
customer_reviews.text: This is nice preschool program I'm going to use it for my in home daycare kids the only issues I have is when printing the print page and the page itself don't match. So if the printer says page 200 the page that your wanting to print might actually be page 193 but other then that I believe this will work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's all there
customer_reviews.text: I like that there is 2 sets of curriculum to choose from
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great software Pre K homeschooling
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Easy to be use, everything there by you need.
customer_reviews.author: NeldaT

customer_reviews.title: Sooo easy and quick!
customer_reviews.text: The curriculum is easy to use, lot of ideas to mix and incorporate into my lesson plans. very easy to use. I would recommend this curriculum to any teacher needing new and stimulating lessons.
customer_reviews.author: swyatt

customer_reviews.title: Overall satified.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter. She is using it and likes it. She does have to pick and choose what to use because there are lessons that involve multiple kids and she has just one. For the price I think it will be a good starting point for her to get her feet wet in homeschooling.
customer_reviews.author: stacy s.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased so far, I feel I got a lot for my $$
customer_reviews.author: A. Rust

customer_reviews.title: The CD is blank
customer_reviews.text: I put it in my computer printed off a few pages then tried putting it in my computer a few days later and nothing comes up. Its acting like the CD is blank. I didn't do anything but print off a few pages. Too expensive if they give you messed up cds. And no I didn't do anything to take the stuff off the CD.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Worth the buy... It has a wide range and plenty of pages of curriculum for it’s price. I chose and printed the pages I think my toddler needs at this time and he loves the activities.
customer_reviews.author: Jamaica

customer_reviews.title: Now I'm A Teacher
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to provide guidance in home schooling my 4 year old grandson. Your CD provides lesson plans that offer great ideas for incorporating music and art in the learning process along with an excellent selection of printable worksheets. Class is beginning and now I feel prepared to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I print a weeks amount of work ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I print a weeks amount of work at a time. People complaining about using so much ink & printing paper and no instructions... it's really not a big deal. Very self explanatory.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C. Rico

customer_reviews.title: It's nice and simple for the young ones
customer_reviews.text: I would arrange the packet of worksheets out differently but all in all... I printed everything right away. It's nice and simple for the young ones. Easy to take documents off disk to pc and then to email for all devices. Nicely made worksheets. A lot of material. Nice seeing an outline of the day already planned out. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Danelle

customer_reviews.text: Great product. My daughter will be three this summer and I don't want to put her in daycare/ preschool. product_meta.title: The Ultimate Preschool Curriculum Kit on CD - Printable Workbooks, Lesson Plans and Learning Activities for Preschoolers, Pre K Kids and Toddlers, Ages 3 - 5 - [DVD-ROM - Printing Required]
product_meta.description:
The Ultimate Preschool Curriculum Kit CD with Printable Workbooks and Lesson Plans.

2 Years of lesson plans
Curriculum A or B - Each curriculum is a complete 10 Month Preschool Program 
Printable circle time posters for each letter, number, shape, and color
Ideal for daycare, preschool or childcare center
Letter recognition & phonics 
Number recognition and math concepts 
Shapes, colors, arts and crafts 
Movement games 
Fine motor and sensory activities
Easy to follow
Great for advanced toddlers and preschoolers
Complete daily lesson plan for home schooling
Over 900 pages of printable content.

All content contained on a single CD

This program is designed for children ages 3-5 for use in a childcare, preschool, or homeschool environment. Each of the two curricula (A & B) are divided into 10 months, each with 20 days. Each curriculum is unique. This gives a full two years of preschool lesson plans. Curriculum A teaches letters in the standard alphabetical sequence. Curriculum B teaches letters using a Montessori approach where the most common letters are taught first. 

You may start any month at any time. Seasonal and holiday lesson plans are separate and can be found at the end of Curriculum A. 

Daily lesson plans are easy to follow and implement. This program is designed to fit into the schedule of your own program, requires minimal preparation and encourages learning through a variety of methods. Materials needed are simple and low-cost. Most daily lesson plans include 1-2 songs, circle time activities, a movement activity, sensory activity, craft ideas and a printable worksheet. 

This program is provided in CD format so you can print one or as many copies as you need.
feature_bullets: OVER 900 PRINTABLE PAGES - CD comes with over 900 pages of printable workbooks, lesson plans and activies
PRINT AS MANY COPIES AS YOU NEED - print as much as you need for a whole class or just one
PERFECT FOR HOMESCHOOL OR DAYCARE USE
NO CD DRIVE? Free digital download of materials with every purchase
ALL CONTENT CONTAINED ON A SINGLE CD

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars558 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
